item.title: WazirX Files Sanction Application: Court Hearing Set for May 13
item.description: WazirX customers can finally heave a sigh of relief. In a much-awaited turn of events, the cryptocurrency exchange has officially filed its sanction application before the Singapore Court as part of its on-going restructuring exercise after a disastrous cyberattack in 2024. The court has scheduled May 13, 2025, for hearing.

item.title: Qualcomm USB Audio Offloading Poised For Linux 6.16 After Going Through 38 Revisions
